Uses of Package
nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api

  • Packages that use nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api 
    Package Description
    nl.naturalis.oaipmh
    REST resources and friends.
    nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api
    Interfaces and classes defining the interface between the REST layer and OAI repository implementations.
    nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api.util
    Classes that can aid in implementing an OAI repository.
  • Classes in nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api used by nl.naturalis.oaipmh 
    Class and Description
    IOAIRepository
    Life-cycle interface defining the capacities of an OAI repository.
    IResumptionTokenParser
    Interface defining the capacity to decompose a resumption token into its constitutent parts.
    OAIPMHRequest
    Standard Java bean modeling an OAI-PMH request.
    RepositoryException
    Base class for all exceptions in this library except OAIPMHException and ApplicationInitializationException.
  • Classes in nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api used by nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api 
    Class and Description
    Argument
    An enumeration of the seven URL query parameters allowed in a OAI-PMH request.
    BadResumptionTokenException
    Thrown when a resumption token cannot be decomposed into its constituent parts.
    IResumptionTokenParser
    Interface defining the capacity to decompose a resumption token into its constitutent parts.
    OAIPMHException
    An OAIPMHException is thrown in response to an error condition explicitly mentioned by the OAI-PMH specs.
    OAIPMHRequest
    Standard Java bean modeling an OAI-PMH request.
    RepositoryException
    Base class for all exceptions in this library except OAIPMHException and ApplicationInitializationException.
  • Classes in nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api used by nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api.util 
    Class and Description
    BadResumptionTokenException
    Thrown when a resumption token cannot be decomposed into its constituent parts.
    IResumptionTokenGenerator
    Interface defining the capacity to compose a resumption token from the information in an OAIPMHRequest instance.
    IResumptionTokenParser
    Interface defining the capacity to decompose a resumption token into its constitutent parts.
    OAIPMHRequest
    Standard Java bean modeling an OAI-PMH request.
